trans-unit.source: LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA data type

seg-source.mrk: LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA data type

target.mrk: LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA data type

trans-unit.source: LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA data type

seg-source.mrk: LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA data type

target.mrk: LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA data type

trans-unit.source: The LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA type allows storage of bit strings up to 32,700 bytes. It is identical to <xref href="rrefsqlj32714.dita#rrefsqlj32714">VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA</xref>, except that you cannot specify a maximum length when creating columns of this type.

seg-source.mrk: The LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA type allows storage of bit strings up to 32,700 bytes.
It is identical to <xref href="rrefsqlj32714.dita#rrefsqlj32714">VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA</xref>, except that you cannot specify a maximum length when creating columns of this type.

target.mrk: The LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA type allows storage of bit strings up to 32,700 bytes.
It is identical to <xref href="rrefsqlj32714.dita#rrefsqlj32714">VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA</xref>, except that you cannot specify a maximum length when creating columns of this type.
